name: "He's Too Sexy for his Fat" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What does the grocery store security guard think Chris is stealing?
questions.explanation:
Ham.

	When the security guard lifts Chris' shirt to take the two hams, he realizes that Chris wasn't stealing, and instead he was just overweight.

questions.text: In what year did Peter win his "Most Ticks" trophy?
questions.explanation:
1965.

	Peter keeps his trophy on his nightstand and mentions it when Lois finds fleas on Stewie.  Brain didn't wear a flea collar, so the house became infested.

questions.text: Why do the Griffins need to call the exterminator?
questions.explanation:
Fleas.

	Brian doesn't wear a flea collar and attracts fleas to the house.  When the exterminators come, they totally ruin the house by shooting walls, throwing grenades, etc.

questions.text: What animal is Stewie's life preserver shaped as?
questions.explanation:
A turtle.

	Stewie isn't willing to go into the pool because he doesn't trust the turtle, but Brian pushes him in and he thinks otherwise.

questions.text: What do the hotel workers think Chris is when he's on the diving board?
questions.explanation:
A van.

	The hotel worker asks Peter if he can remove his van from the diving board, but Lois says that it's Chris, so the hotel worker yells to everyone that it's actually a fat kid.

questions.text: What exercise does Chris not do to lose weight?
questions.explanation:
Yoga.

	Peter becomes Chris coach to help him lose weight, but all of his exercise techniques are dangerous and weird.

questions.text: Who gains a lot of weight during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Stewie.

	After eating to make Chris feel bad, Stewie begins to get fat and his high chair breaks.  Brian starts to spin him because he's so round.

questions.text: What does Peter try give to the beautiful woman on a scavenger hunt?
questions.explanation:
His foot.

	Peter realizes that most people would do anything for a beautiful person, so he remembers the time he was going to cut off his foot for a beautiful woman on her scavenger hunt.  He doesn't actually cut off his foot.

questions.text: When Peter crashes his car, what does he fall into?
questions.explanation:
Lard.

	Peter eats a large vat of lard and it makes him fat again.  He crashed his car because he kept looking at himself in his mirror rather than watching the road.  Everything goes back to normal in the end, and Peter doesn't learn his lesson.

Cleveland.

	Cleveland recommends his brother to give Chris liposuction, but instead, Peter gets the liposuction, and Chris stays on his diet.  All of the neighbours appear in the next episode.
